title: Affirm shares surge 34% and head for best day in three years after earnings beat
content: Affirm shares soared on Thursday after the provider of buy now, pay later loans reported better-than-expected quarterly results.
summary: Affirm shares soared on Thursday after the provider of buy now, pay later loans reported better-than-expected quarterly results.

title: German inflation posts surprise drop to 2% in August
content: The harmonzied German consumer price index eased to 2% in August, the statistics office Destatis said Thursday.
summary: The harmonzied German consumer price index eased to 2% in August, the statistics office Destatis said Thursday.

title: CNBC's Inside India newsletter: A tale of tier 2 cities
content: India's economic map is being redrawn.
summary: India's economic map is being redrawn.

title: Nvidia shares fall despite earnings beating estimates
content: Nvidia shares fell on Thursday despite its fiscal second-quarter results beating estimates.
summary: Nvidia shares fell on Thursday despite its fiscal second-quarter results beating estimates.

title: Uber takes stake in SoftBank-backed self-driving tech startup Wayve
content: Uber and British artificial intelligence startup Wayve announced a partnership Thursday that will see the two collaborate on autonomous driving technology.
summary: Uber and British artificial intelligence startup Wayve announced a partnership Thursday that will see the two collaborate on autonomous driving technology.

title: UN nuclear watchdog chief pushes back on Moscow’s calls for objectivity after Kursk plant visit
content: Russia accused Ukraine of attempting a drone strike at the Kursk nuclear plant during a lightning cross-border incursion under way since early August.
summary: Russia accused Ukraine of attempting a drone strike at the Kursk nuclear plant during a lightning cross-border incursion under way since early August.

title: Trump says plan to make U.S. 'crypto capital of the planet' coming within hours
content: Trump told his 90 million followers on X that he will lay out "a plan to ensure the United States will be the crypto capital of the planet" later on Thursday.
summary: Trump told his 90 million followers on X that he will lay out "a plan to ensure the United States will be the crypto capital of the planet" later on Thursday.

title: ‘Vigorous give and take’: U.S. security advisor discusses economic curbs in rare trip to China
content: U.S. national security advisor Jake Sullivan said he raised concerns about the country's focus on economic security in meetings with Chinese officials.
summary: U.S. national security advisor Jake Sullivan said he raised concerns about the country's focus on economic security in meetings with Chinese officials.

title: Spain will pay digital nomads and remote workers in tech up to $17,000 to move to a rural region: Here’s what to know
content: The Spanish region of Extremadura is offering up to 200 digital nomads and remote workers as much as $16,703 in grants to relocate there for at least two years.
summary: The Spanish region of Extremadura is offering up to 200 digital nomads and remote workers as much as $16,703 in grants to relocate there for at least two years.

title: You have a right to ignore your bosses — but only in these countries, and after work hours
content: Australia has joined the list of countries that allow employees the "right to disconnect" from work.
summary: Australia has joined the list of countries that allow employees the "right to disconnect" from work.

title: Delivery Hero shares pop 10% as European food delivery giant plans IPO of  Middle East unit
content: Delivery Hero CEO Niklas Ostberg said the IPO of its Middle East business was about bringing in local investors in the region to co-invest and support the unit.
summary: Delivery Hero CEO Niklas Ostberg said the IPO of its Middle East business was about bringing in local investors in the region to co-invest and support the unit.

title: Nokia phone maker launches Barbie handset for $130 — with no internet
content: HMD, the company behind Nokia-branded phones, launched a Barbie-branded phone Wednesday that comes with calls and texts — but no internet.
summary: HMD, the company behind Nokia-branded phones, launched a Barbie-branded phone Wednesday that comes with calls and texts — but no internet.

title: Slowdown in Nvidia's sales growth spooks chip stocks in U.S. and Asia
content: Losses were most pronounced in Nvidia's direct suppliers, such as TSMC and SK Hynix

title: These Asian firms in Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway portfolio have surged, with one soaring 30%
content: Berkshire hit a $1 trillion market capitalization on Wednesday, the first non-technology company in the U.S. to hit the milestone.
summary: Berkshire hit a $1 trillion market capitalization on Wednesday, the first non-technology company in the U.S. to hit the milestone.

title: Dollar General shares crater 25% as retailer cuts outlook, blaming 'financially constrained' customers
content: The discount retailer slashed its guidance for full-year same-store sales and profit.
summary: The discount retailer slashed its guidance for full-year same-store sales and profit.

title: CrowdStrike beats quarterly consensus but lowers full-year guidance
content: CrowdStrike expects less revenue for the full fiscal year following a broad-based outage on July 19 stemming from a buggy software update.
summary: CrowdStrike expects less revenue for the full fiscal year following a broad-based outage on July 19 stemming from a buggy software update.

title: Japan's next prime minister could be the youngest candidate in a crowded election for party leadership
content: Shinjiro Koizumi surfed and ate sashimi in Fukushima to quell water safety concerns. He was also the first sitting cabinet minister to take paternity leave.
summary: Shinjiro Koizumi surfed and ate sashimi in Fukushima to quell water safety concerns. He was also the first sitting cabinet minister to take paternity leave.

title: Nvidia's earnings report shows the problem of being priced for perfection
content: Nvidia topped Wall Street estimates across the board in its earnings report on Wednesday, though its gross margin showed slight slippage.
summary: Nvidia topped Wall Street estimates across the board in its earnings report on Wednesday, though its gross margin showed slight slippage.

title: Best Buy shares surge on profit beat and guidance hike
content: Best Buy now expects to see full-year adjusted earnings per share in the range of $6.10 to $6.35, up from a prior range of $5.75 to $6.20.
summary: Best Buy now expects to see full-year adjusted earnings per share in the range of $6.10 to $6.35, up from a prior range of $5.75 to $6.20.

title: Finland will soon bury nuclear waste in a geological tomb that’s built to last for 100,000 years
content: The pioneering project has been hailed as both a watershed moment for the long-term sustainability of nuclear energy and "a model for the entire world."
